comments:
Build:  TPTP-4.3.0-200609220100

When I profile an application and open the Execution stat view, I get the exception pasted below.  This doesn't happen with a new workspace, it's only happening with an old workspace that I have. 

Guru,

Can you have Alexander/Pavel look at the exception to see if there is anything that can be done to avoid the exception? (e.g. checking for null)
